attributes.action: Virgin Money to waiver their fee completely on all donations given to the NHS
attributes.additional_details: For example, Virgin Money Giving currently charge a 2% platform fee and a 2.5% payment processing fee, this should be wavered on all NHS donations being raised.
attributes.background: All donations to the national health service that have any fees associated with processing the donations should be wavered going forward and retrospectively to maximise the money raised to help combat the current and any future pandemics.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for Virgin Money and other fundraising companies.
